Instant Analysis | Kentucky-Boston University

Kyle Tucker, ktucker@courier-journal.com 8:12 p.m. EST November 21, 2014
Buy Photo

UK guard Dominique Hawkins drives on De'Andre Davis during the University of Kentucky men's basketball game against Grand Canyon at Rupp Arena in Lexington, Ky. Friday, November 14, 2014.(Photo: By Mike Weaver, Special to the CJ)Buy Photo

CONNECT 7 TWEETLINKEDINCOMMENTEMAILMORE

No. 1 Kentucky is getting more of a game from Boston University tonight than against fifth-ranked Kansas on Tuesday night. The Cats have led by 10 a couple of times, but it's down to 40-35 at halftime here at Rupp Arena.

Dominique Hawkins was a surprise starter with the Cats' first platoon because Alex Poythress is out sick. He's made a major impact with five points, a steal, assist and rebound. He also forced an airball and nearly had another steal before a tie-up gave it back to BU.

The first platoon (Harrison twins, Hawkins, Towns and Cauley-Stein) is far outperforming the second platoon (Ulis, Booker, Lyles, Lee and Johnson) so far in this one. Here's the full breakdown:

KENTUCKY'S TWO PLATOONS VS. BOSTON U

Platoon 1 20:00 to 16:15, 7-4 UK lead (3-5 FG, 1-4 rebounding, 1 turnover, 7-4 margin in 3:45)

Platoon 2 16:15 to 12:18, 16-12 UK lead (4-8 FG, 4-3 rebounding, 2 turnovers, 9-8 margin in 3:57)

Platoon 1 12:18 to 7:31, 26-16 UK lead (5-9 FG, 3-4 rebounding, 0 turnovers, 10-4 margin in 4:47)

Platoon 2 7:31 to 6:17, 26-19 UK lead (0-0 FG, 2-1 rebounding, 3 turnovers, 0-3 margin in 1:14)

Platoon 1 6:17 to 2:39, 33-26 UK lead (3-5 FG, 4-1 rebounding, 2 turnovers, 7-7 margin in 3:38)

Platoon 2 2:39 to 0:00, 40-35 UK lead (2-3 FG, 2-2 rebounding, 0 turnovers, 7-9 margin in 2:39)

TOTALS: Platoon 1 outscored BU 24-15, shot 11 of 19, got outrebounded 9-8, 3 turnovers in 12:15; Platoon 2 was outscored 20-16, shot 6 of 11, outrebounded BU 8-6, 5 turnovers in 7:45.

* Dominique Hawkins started with Platoon 1 in place of Alex Poythress, who sat out with an illness. Derek Willis took Poythress' place for part of the platoon's second rotation, but was yanked after airballing a 3-pointer and Hawkins went the rest of the way.
